title: The Camel who took a walk (K)
brief_description: From the book written by Jack Tworkov, illustrated by Roger Duvoisin, this children’s film tells the story of a camel and what “did not” happen to him as he set out for his morning walk. Uses the pictures and text from the book. Suitable for pre-school level.
